hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: The hostname that identifies this virtual node in the Netdata UI and API. Must be unique within your monitoring environment.

guid.title: GUID
guid.description: Uniquely identifies the node. Must be in [UUID format](https://www.guidgen.com/). Changing this value will result in creating a **new Virtual Node** - the existing Virtual Node and its history will not be modified.

address.title: Address
address.description: Optional IP address or DNS name that plugins can use for $HOSTADDRESS$ macros.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Optional key-value pairs that help categorize and organize virtual nodes.

custom_vars.title: Custom host variables
custom_vars.description: Optional key-value pairs exposed to plugins as $_HOSTVAR$ macros.

hostname.ui:placeholder: If not specified, the job name will be used as the hostname.

guid.ui:help: Generate a UUID using the command line: `uuidgen` on macOS/Linux or `[guid]::NewGuid()` in PowerShell.

labels.ui:help: Labels can be used for filtering and grouping in the Netdata UI. Common labels include environment, region, service, team, etc.
